characters.name: Ahlbi Ur'gaid
characters.description1: The defendant. This industrious young man is both a monk in training and a Khura'inese tour guide.

characters.name: Gaspen Payne
characters.description1: A prosecutor from back home, though what he's doing here as Khura'in's chief prosecutor is beyond me.
characters.description2: It seems he was dismissed from his former position and somehow wound up as chief prosecutor in this country instead.

characters.name: Paht Rohl
characters.description1: The victim in this case. He guarded the treasure room treasure, and was killed by the thief who stole it.
characters.description2: The victim in this case. A guard of the temple who tried to steal the treasure.

characters.name: Rayfa Padma Khura'in
characters.description1: A Khura'inist priestess and crown princess of Khura'in. She has the powers of a spirit medium.
characters.description2: A Khura'inist priestess and crown princess of Khura'in. Her Divination Séances show the last moments of the dead.

characters.name: Pees'lubn Andistan'dhin
characters.description1: An eyewitness to this incident. Tehm'pul Temple's head monk and a musician for the Dance of Devotion.

characters.name: Ahlbi Ur'gaid
characters.description1: The defendant. This young man is both a monk in training and a Khura'inese tour guide.

characters.name: Rayfa Padma Khura'in
characters.description1: The Royal Priestess of the Kingdom of Khura'in. Her Insights determine the fate of the accused.

characters.name: Gaspen Payne
characters.description1: The prosecutor. I get the feeling that I've met him before, but I just can't remember.

characters.name: Paht Rohl
characters.description1: The victim of this case. He guarded the treasure room treasure, and was killed by the thief who stole it.

characters.name: Trucy Wright
characters.description1: A particular set of circumstances led to her being adopted by Mr. Wright. A world-class magician on the rise.

characters.name: Athena Cykes
characters.description1: The youngest lawyer in our agency. She apparently studied psychology in Europe.

characters.name: Phoenix Wright
characters.description1: My boss. He's taught me a lot about what it means to be a lawyer.

characters.name: Bonny → Bonny de Famme
characters.description1: A bunny-themed assistant who appeared onstage with Trucy.
characters.description2: A magician who performed teleportation magic during the show.

characters.name: Mr. Retinz → Roger Retinz
characters.description1: A man somehow connected to the magic show. He showed up at the theater after the incident took place.
characters.description2: A producer at Take-2 TV known as the Ratings Rajah. He's famous, apparently.

characters.name: The Great Mr. Reus
characters.description1: The victim in this case. A magician who took the stage with Trucy.
characters.description2: The victim in this case. His real name is Manov Mistree.

characters.name: Ema Skye
characters.description1: A detective. It looks like she finally became the forensic investigator she always wanted to be.

characters.name: Nahyuta Sahdmadhi
characters.description1: A prosecutor from Khura'in. He's also a monk, which explains why he's known as the "Last Rites Prosecutor."

characters.name: Betty de Famme
characters.description1: A magician who performed with Trucy. She is actually Bonny's twin sister.

characters.name: Ahlbi Ur'gaid
characters.description1: My guide. This industrious young man is both a monk in training and a Khura'inese tour guide.

characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: A practitioner of the Kurain Channeling Technique. We used to take on all sorts of cases together.

characters.name: Ema Skye
characters.description1: A detective with a love of science. She's finally achieved her dream of becoming a forensic investigator.

characters.name: Tahrust Inmee
characters.description1: Khura'inist high priest in charge of the rites of Lady Kee'ra. Killed during the Purification Rite. Has a clergyman's mark on his brow.

characters.name: Nahyuta Sahdmadhi
characters.description1: A Khura'inese prosecutor and monk. He's also known as the "Last Rites Prosecutor."

characters.name: Rayfa Padma Khura'in
characters.description1: A Khura'inist priestess and crown princess of Khura'in. Her Divination Séances show the last moments of the dead.

characters.name: Puhray Zeh'lot
characters.description1: An apprentice priest living in the high priest's house. He's like part of the family.
characters.description2: Proven to be a fake name. His real name was Rheel Neh'mu. His real identity was that of a Khura'inist monk.

characters.name: ??? → Datz Are'bal
characters.description1: A strange guy. You can't see his face on account of his beard. Pretty suspicious, if you ask me.
characters.description2: XO of the Defiant Dragons. He escaped from prison. At one point he was a paratrooper in some country's airborne unit.

characters.name: Beh'leeb Inmee
characters.description1: Widow of the victim. She usually plays the part of Lady Kee'ra in the Purification Rite.

characters.name: Simon Blackquill
characters.description1: A prosecutor who excels at psychological manipulation. As far as psychology goes, he's kind of like my senior, I guess.

characters.name: Taifu Toneido
characters.description1: A rakugo storyteller of fifty-five years who is famous for his soba-based routines. He has two disciples under him in his troupe.

characters.name: Bucky Whet
characters.description1: My client for this case, and the fourth head of Whet Soba. He's still got a lot to learn about noodle making.

characters.name: Nahyuta Sahdmadhi
characters.description1: A prosecutor from the Kingdom of Khura'in. He's also known as the "Last Rites Prosecutor."

characters.name: Geiru Toneido
characters.description1: Balloon artist and her master's senior disciple. She has twelve years of performance under her belt.

characters.name: Uendo Toneido
characters.description1: A rakugo storyteller and junior disciple after Geiru. He has less experience than Geiru, yet he's become higher ranked than her.

characters.name: Trucy Wright
characters.description1: A particular set of circumstances led to her being adopted by Mr. Wright. A world-class magician on the rise.

characters.name: Athena Cykes
characters.description1: The youngest lawyer in our agency. She apparently studied psychology in Europe.

characters.name: Phoenix Wright
characters.description1: My boss. He taught me a lot about what it means to be a lawyer.

characters.name: Nahyuta Sahdmadhi
characters.description1: A prosecutor from Khura'in. He's also a monk, which explains why he's known as the "Last Rites Prosecutor."

characters.name: Dhurke Sahdmadhi
characters.description1: Leader of the Defiant Dragons, and the man who raised me. He was a lawyer once.

characters.name: Archie Buff
characters.description1: An archeologist in Kurain Village. He was asked by someone to study the Founder's Orb.

characters.name: Datz Are'bal
characters.description1: A member of the Defiant Dragons, and Dhurke's right-hand man. He's always been one to laugh at just about anything.

characters.name: Ema Skye
characters.description1: A detective. It looks like she finally became the forensics investigator she always wanted to be.

characters.name: Paul Atishon
characters.description1: He's looking to represent Kurain Village. His remarkable self-confidence is blinding.

characters.name: Sergeant Buff → Armie Buff
characters.description1: The doctor's reclusive child. He lost his mother in a fire.
characters.description2: The doctor's child. A self-styled sergeant. Her mother was ex-Russian military.

characters.name: Pearl Fey
characters.description1: Ms. Maya Fey's cousin. She's also one of Kurain Village's spirit mediums. She's always really courteous.

characters.name: Miles Edgeworth
characters.description1: Mr. Wright's best friend and the district's chief prosecutor. His frilly cravat makes a strong fashion statement.

characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: Mr. Wright's former assistant. She's currently training in Khura'in. I'm told she can channel the dead.

characters.name: Inga Karkhuul Khura'in
characters.description1: Khura'in's Minister of Justice and the kingdom's second-in-command.
characters.description2: Khura'in's Minister of Justice and the victim in this case.

characters.name: Rayfa Padma Khura'in
characters.description1: Daughter of Ga'ran and princess of Khura'in who is more than a little spoiled.

characters.name: Ga'ran Sigatar Khura'in
characters.description1: The grand priestess and queen of Khura'in. It's said that she can channel the dead.

characters.name: Nayna
characters.description1: Rayfa's attendant. She disappeared all of a sudden after Minister Inga's death.

characters.name: Ahlbi Ur'gaid
characters.description1: When not undergoing monastic training, this plucky kid works as a tour guide.

characters.name: Amara Sigatar Khura'in
characters.description1: The previous queen. She is a spirit medium known as the grand priestess and possesses incredible spiritual power.

characters.name: Trucy Wright
characters.description1: An aspiring magician and my daughter. I adopted her nine years ago.

characters.name: Athena Cykes
characters.description1: The newest lawyer in my office with a background in psychology.

characters.name: Apollo Justice
characters.description1: A reliable subordinate at my office. Serious and hot-blooded with vocal chords made of steel.

characters.name: Nahyuta Sahdmadhi
characters.description1: A Khura'inese prosecutor and monk. He's also known as the "Last Rites Prosecutor."

characters.name: Dhurke Sahdmadhi
characters.description1: Leader of the Defiant Dragons and Apollo's adoptive father.

characters.name: Datz Are'bal
characters.description1: The Defiant Dragons' XO and Dhurke's right-hand man. He will laugh at just about anything.

characters.name: Ema Skye
characters.description1: A detective with a love of science. She's finally achieved her dream of becoming a forensics investigator.

characters.name: Miles Edgeworth
characters.description1: The district's chief prosecutor and my childhood friend. We used to go head-to-head back in his courtroom days.

characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: A practitioner of the Kurain Channeling Technique. We used to take on all sorts of cases together.

characters.name: Inga Karkhuul Khura'in
characters.description1: Khura'in's Minister of Justice. He was killed during the hostage exchange.

characters.name: Rayfa Padma Khura'in
characters.description1: A Khura'inist priestess and crown princess of Khura'in. Her Divination Séances show the last memories of the dead.

characters.name: Ga'ran Sigatar Khura'in
characters.description1: The grand priestess and queen of Khura'in. It's said that she can channel the dead.

characters.name: Nayna
characters.description1: Rayfa's attendant. She disappeared all of a sudden after Minister Inga's death.

characters.name: Ahlbi Ur'gaid
characters.description1: When not undergoing monastic training, this plucky kid works as a tour guide.

characters.name: Trucy Wright
characters.description1: My adopted daughter. She's been skyrocketing her way toward being a top-class magician.

characters.name: Athena Cykes
characters.description1: The newest lawyer in my office with a background in psychology.

characters.name: Larry Butz
characters.description1: An old friend of mine and an aspiring picture book author. As we used to say, when something smells, it's usually the Butz.

characters.name: Ellen Wyatt
characters.description1: My client in this case. Larry brought her to me. She works as a maid for the Sprocket family.

characters.name: Ema Skye
characters.description1: A detective friend of mine. She's finally achieved her dream of being a forensics investigator.

characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: A practitioner of the Kurain Channeling Technique. We used to take on all sorts of cases together.

characters.name: Miles Edgeworth
characters.description1: The district's chief prosecutor and my childhood friend. We used to go head-to-head back in his courtroom days.

characters.name: Dumas Gloomsbury
characters.description1: The victim and lead servant of the Sprocket family household. The other servants called him "Mister-Doom-n'-Gloom."

characters.name: Sorin Sprocket
characters.description1: Ellen's fiancé and future president of Sprocket Aviation. He is meticulous about his note taking.

characters.name: Pierce Nichody
characters.description1: The Sprocket family butler. He seems unusually attached to the pocket watch he carries around.

characters.name: Selena Sprocket
characters.description1: Sorin's older sister. She passed away due to her injuries from a car accident.
characters.description2: Sorin's older sister who died after a car accident. It seems she had a fiancé at the time.

characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: A practitioner of the Kurain Channeling Technique. I'm supposed to go sightseeing with her and Pearls today.

characters.name: Pearl Fey
characters.description1: Maya's cousin and a spirit medium from Kurain Village. She came all the way to Khura'in to do some sightseeing.

characters.name: Ahlbi Ur'gaid
characters.description1: A young boy who works as a tour guide. He's supposed to be showing us around today.

characters.name: Rayfa Padma Khura'in
characters.description1: The crown princess of the Kingdom of Khura'in. She's still in training and can't channel spirits yet.

characters.name: Miles Edgeworth
characters.description1: The district's chief prosecutor and my childhood friend, though I'm not sure what he's doing here in Khura'in...

characters.name: Athena Cykes
characters.description1: The youngest lawyer in our agency. She's off today, so she's out having fun somewhere.

characters.name: Trucy Wright
characters.description1: A magician with real talent. She's too busy rehearsing for her magic show to come today.

characters.name: Rayfa Padma Khura'in
characters.description1: The crown princess of the Kingdom of Khura'in. Mr. Wright saddled me with the task of showing her around.

characters.name: Klavier Gavin
characters.description1: Mr. Rockstar Prosecutor himself, he was once the frontman of a band called the Gavinners.

characters.name: Jinxie Tenma
characters.description1: A girl who was involved in a past case of mine. It seems she and Athena have become good friends.
